title: cmd/go: error message shows wrong package path when using ... wildcard
body:
For example:

$ go get -d code.google.com/p/rsc/...
package code.google.com/p/rsc/...
	imports appengine: unrecognized import path "appengine"
package code.google.com/p/rsc/...
	imports appengine/datastore: unrecognized import path "appengine/datastore"
package code.google.com/p/rsc/...
	imports appengine/memcache: unrecognized import path "appengine/memcache"

It shows the path provided on the command line, not the package that has the bad import.
